extendedInfo.description: Thareb ÙAlhayat Personal Healthcare Record (PHR), he  is Healthcare Record where patient will be able to supervise her/his medical information to record, edit and store her/his data. The PHR intended to provide a complete summary of a patient medical history that is accessible online.PHR consists of 5 crucial parts:1- Home: The PHR home page provides reports that allow patient to supervise her/his Blood Pressure, Blood Glucose, Heart rate and Temperature.2- Registration: In order to use the PHR system, patient shall register and providing her/his personal information data.3- Vital Signs:  In this page patient is able to enter, edit or monitor her/his vital signs (Blood Pressure, Blood Glucose, Heart rate and Temperature). 4- Booking:  This section gives a patient the opportunity to do his/her appointment through this software; therefore he will be able to consult a previous appointment.5-Prescription:  All details of patient prescription history are accessible via this page.
